sentence: let me reinforce this point by sharing this quote from ben bernanke, chairman of the federal reserve's board of governors: the federal reserve's mission of conducting monetary policy and maintaining a stable financial system depends upon the participation and support of an educated public.
label: LABEL_0

sentence: as the fed pursues the monetary policy objectives that have been set out for us by congress--to pursue price stability, maximum employment, and moderate long-term interest rates--it is essential that the public understand our objectives and our actions.
label: LABEL_0
